from sys import stdin, stdout
t = int(stdin.readline())
#t = int(raw_input())
while t:
    t -= 1
    s = stdin.readline().strip()
    d = int(stdin.readline())
    temp = s[:d-1]
    choice = len(s)-d+1
    j = s[d-1:]
    if choice%2 == 0:
        j += temp
    else:
        j += temp[::-1]
    stdout.write(j+'\n')
